reporting.reportgraph.GraphQuery:
DECLARE @GlobalObjects bit; SET @GlobalObjects = {%Settings.CMSStoreUseGlobalOrderStatus?1:0|(identity)GlobalAdministrator|(hash)99a32b1546f8e74ed5c0fcae6248f5671db590dc70b5a7957d500c4acf97b95e%};
SELECT StatusDisplayName AS '{$orderstatuslist.header$}', CAST(ISNULL(ROUND(SUM(OrderGrandTotalInMainCurrency),1),0) AS DECIMAL(38,1)) AS '{$com.sales.volumeofsales$}' FROM COM_OrderStatus LEFT JOIN COM_Order ON OrderStatusID = StatusID AND OrderSiteID = @CMSContextCurrentSiteID AND (OrderDate >= @FromDate OR @FromDate IS NULL) AND (OrderDate <= DATEADD(day,1,@ToDate) OR @ToDate IS NULL) WHERE (StatusEnabled = 1 OR StatusID IN (SELECT OrderStatusID FROM COM_Order WHERE OrderSiteID = @CMSContextCurrentSiteID)) AND ((StatusSiteID = @CMSContextCurrentSiteID AND @GlobalObjects = 0) OR (StatusSiteID IS NULL AND @GlobalObjects = 1)) GROUP BY StatusDisplayName, StatusOrder ORDER BY StatusOrder
